description: The Meeting Cost Calculator is a tool designed for use within the 'make' platform to help users quantify the costs associated with their meetings. This tool calculates the total cost of meetings down to the final cent by factoring in elements such as participant salaries, meeting duration, and frequency. It aims to provide insightful data that can encourage more mindful meeting practices. The tool can be built as part of a workflow, enhancing team efficiency and resource allocation. For detailed usage and setup, users are encouraged to refer to the official documentation provided by the make community.
